Author: SharkeyMyrl

Dialog.&c&lEvelina: Could you help me? I seem to have gotten myself into a peculiar situation...
I recently got a large piece of land to start growing my lovely trees in, but the land is decrypted and covered in debris from some anbondoned village...

SendMessageOptions: What do you want from me...

Dialog.&c&lEvelina: If you could just help me gather 32 Rotten Flesh and 64 Oak Logs
Oh... Okay I'll leave you alone...
Well it is a rather tall order, I need a lot of Rotten Flesh and Logs.
I need about 128 Rotten Flesh and 246 Oak Logs.

SendMessageOptions: I can get that for you, no problem.

Dialog.&c&lEvelina: Thank you so much! I need to buy some more supplies so I'll meet you back here when I'm done.
Stupid! Stupid Evelina! of course their to busy to help you...
